title: Trump UFO 'Disclosure' Date Sparks Backlash as Critics Call July 8 Claim Another Hoax
description: Trump UFO Disclosure Date Triggers Mockery as July 8 Claim Faces Hoax Accusations

title: UFO Shock Claim as Whistleblower Says South Korea Used Energy Weapon to Down Giant Craft
description: A whistleblower claims South Korea used an energy weapon to down a giant UFO, sparking fierce debate over truth, proof and long running scepticism.

title: The 'UAP Trap' Is Here as New Tech Promises Hard Proof of UFOs in Earth's Airspace
description: New UAP tracking technology promises hard data on UFOs as scientists launch a coordinated 'UAP Trap' to finally see what is in our skies.

title: Shaun Ryder has been 'pestered by aliens' for 50 years and must be a 'UFO magnet'
description: Shaun Ryder has claimed that he still sees UFOs 'zigzagging across the sky at thousands and thousands of miles an hour' several years after he made his first claim

title: UAP, Chinese varsity join hands for research collaboration
description: PESHAWAR: University of Agriculture Peshawar (UAP) and Northwest Agriculture and Forestry University China signed a Memorandum of Understating (MoU) to strengthen academic and research collaboration.Prof. Emeritus Dr. Jehan Bakht, Vice Chancellor of University of Agriculture Peshawar and Prof. Dr. Zhang Lixin, Chairman, Silk Road Bio Health Agri. Industry Alliance, Northwest Agriculture and Forestry University China signed the MoU in a ceremony held in the office of Chairman Pakistan Science Foundation (PSF) Islamabad, said a release issued here Saturday. Pakistan Science Foundation (PSF) facilitated Signing of MoU.The ceremony was attended by Chairman PSF Islamabad Prof Dr. Muhammad Akmal, Registrar UAP and Focal Person for MoU, Dr. Rizwan Ahmad and Director ORIC UAP Prof. Dr. Muhammad Arif.The MoU aims to promote cooperation in teaching, research and faculty and student exchange programs between the two institutions. This collaboration is expected to enhance academic and research linkages between the two countries. The partnership would focus on areas like agricultural research, technology transfer and skill development programs.Prof. Emeritus Dr. Jehan Bakht expressed hope that the MoU would be a milestone for strengthening academic collaboration, promoting joint research micinitiatives and fostering long-term institutional partnerships between the two sides.Copyright Business Recorder, 2026
